plan_title: Data Management Plan - FairTriEdge-FL Clinical Study

data_types: Clinical data from electronic health records
AI system outputs and performance metrics
data_management_overview.data_volume: Estimated 10,000 patient records with ~200 data points each

collection_methods.automated_data_extraction: Direct integration with EHR systems where possible
collection_methods.quality_control: Double data entry for critical variables

data_validation.real_time_validation: Range checks and consistency rules in EDC system
data_validation.source_data_verification: 10% random sample verification against source documents

missing_data_handling.prevention: Required field validation in EDC system
missing_data_handling.imputation: Multiple imputation for key variables if appropriate

data_cleaning.query_management: Formal query process for data discrepancies

access_controls.role_based_access: Access limited based on job function
access_controls.audit_trails: All data access logged and monitored

data_encryption.backup_encryption: Encrypted backups with secure key management

privacy_protection.de_identification: Direct identifiers removed from analysis datasets
privacy_protection.limited_datasets: Minimum necessary data for research purposes
privacy_protection.data_use_agreements: Formal agreements with all participating sites

primary_storage.backup_strategy: Daily automated backups with geographic redundancy

internal_sharing.dsmb_access: Safety data for Data Safety Monitoring Board

external_sharing.data_repository: Consider sharing de-identified data in public repository
